Class Daytime

  • java.lang.Object
    • Daytime

  • public class Daytime
extends java.lang.Object
    Daytime keeps track of the current time in the game and the light that is appropriate for that time. It also keeps track of the number of days that have passed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Daytime()
      Constructor for Daytime class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addTime()
      Adds time (2 min) after each action to determine the light value
      static int getLightValue()
      Returns the light value for use by NPCs and Rooms
      static java.lang.String getTime()
      Returns the time for general use
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void setLightValue(int addLight)
      Sets light value based on hour
      static void setTime(java.lang.String time_)
      Sets the in game time to something other than zero (midnight)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • setTime

        public static void setTime(java.lang.String time_)
        Sets the in game time to something other than zero (midnight)
        Parameters:
        time_ - String that is to be converted into ints to set the time

        Adds time (2 min) after each action to determine the light value

        Returns the time for general use

      • setLightValue

        public static void setLightValue(int addLight)
        Sets light value based on hour
        Parameters:

      • getLightValue

        Returns the light value for use by NPCs and Rooms
